title: Unwilling
description: Alexandra and Melissa are coworkers who entirely hate each other, each for her own reasons. One Friday night, Melissa desperately needs Alex to save Melissa's job.Alex gives Melissa an offer: be her servant for a month or join the unemployment line, believing Melissa would rather take her chances than bow to Alexandra. Instead, Melissa accepts.This 30,000 word novella (about 100 printed pages) features domination, submission, bondage, and just a touch of some hot sex.
author: Julia P. Lynde
